mapper.select: SELECT count(DISTINCT(T.quotation_header_id)) FROM `ssrc_rfx_quotation_line` t WHERE t.quotation_header_id IN ( SELECT y.quotation_header_id FROM ssrc_rfx_quotation_header y WHERE y.rfx_header_id = #{rfxHeaderId} )
SELECT t.quotation_round_number FROM ssrc_round_header t where t.source_header_id = #{rfxHeaderId}

SELECT t.quotation_header_id quotationHeaderId, t.supplier_company_name supplierCompanyName, y.company_num companyNum, t.supplier_company_ip supplierCompanyIp, x.technology_score technologyScore, x.business_score businessScore, x.score score, x.score_rank scoreRank, sum( z.total_amount ) total_amount FROM ssrc_rfx_quotation_header t LEFT JOIN sslm_supplier_basic y ON t.supplier_company_id = y.supplier_company_id LEFT JOIN ssrc_evaluate_summary x ON t.quotation_header_id = x.quotation_header_id LEFT JOIN ssrc_rfx_quotation_line z ON z.quotation_header_id = t.quotation_header_id WHERE t.rfx_header_id = #{rfxHeaderId} GROUP BY t.quotation_header_id ORDER BY x.score_rank
SELECT COUNT( t.suggested_flag ) suggested_flag FROM ssrc_rfx_quotation_line t WHERE t.quotation_header_id = #{id} AND t.suggested_flag = 1
SELECT t.suggested_remark FROM ssrc_rfx_quotation_line t WHERE t.quotation_header_id = #{id} ORDER BY t.suggested_remark LIMIT 0,1
SELECT t.rfx_header_id FROM `ssrc_rfx_header` t WHERE t.rfx_num = #{rfxNum} AND t.tenant_id = #{tenantId}
SELECT t.quotation_amount FROM `ssrc_round_rank_header` t WHERE t.quotation_header_id = #{s} AND t.quotation_round_number = 1 limit 0,1
SELECT t.quotation_header_id FROM `ssrc_rfx_quotation_header` t WHERE t.rfx_header_id = #{rfxHeaderId} AND t.tenant_id = #{tenantId}
SELECT t.rfx_line_item_id FROM `ssrc_rfx_line_item` t WHERE t.rfx_header_id = #{rfxHeaderId}
SELECT suggested_flag,suggested_remark,allotted_quantity,allotted_ratio,change_percent FROM ssrc_rfx_quotation_line WHERE quotation_header_id = #{id} limit 0,1
